```{r fig.width=12}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = -31, max = -30),
                 lng = runif(20, min = ,22.5, max = 23))

df %>% leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers()
```
